sentence.Network_en: His inspiration to fly came even before he joined the Army.
sentence.Network_cn: 他想开飞机的念头在参军之前就有了。

sentence.Network_en: Then the woodcutter let his axe fly— Thwack! Everyone heard it.
sentence.Network_cn: 然后那个伐木工脱手甩出了斧头。哐！每个人都听见了。

sentence.Network_en: Small things stirred in the grass around the tent.
sentence.Network_cn: 一些小东西在帐篷四周的草丛里窸窸窣窣地动着。

list.abs: 呵呵一天不洗，为本校的节约用水立下了汗“脚”功绩呀，但是味儿却实受不了呀，您要是第一回去，一线门帘(tent fly)能熏一个大跟斗，要是不睁眼以为是到了厕所了呢！你要是一睁眼一看，还不如厕所呢！

means.word_mean: 1. flap consisting of a piece of canvas that can be drawn back to provide entrance to a tent

auth_sentence.content: Whatever, it features an impossibly fly bass solo.
auth_sentence.res_content: Whatever, it features an impossibly fly bass solo.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Whatever, it features an impossibly fly bass solo.

auth_sentence.content: Go Fly a Kite feels like music by numbers.
auth_sentence.res_content: Go Fly a Kite feels like music by numbers.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Go Fly a Kite feels like music by numbers.

auth_sentence.content: We were selling cups of juice from our tent.
auth_sentence.res_content: We were selling cups of juice from our tent.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: We were selling cups of juice from our tent.

baesInfo.translate_msg: 以上结果来自百度翻译。
